TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kakurut, title = Kakurut, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakurut} }

S.FORM: kakurut malecaday atu tananuman, u mikayatay a masarengusay ku caang, kilemel a mikucakuc. Dengay a mibuhat tu sakaen, tu su'aw, tu caledes, tu duku, tu lemawan ku kakurut. I tini i Taywan, Makala tu patekenan ku mihecaan nu nika'urip nu kakurut nu lutuk. Belung samin i matini a paluma, a mibuwah. u tapang nu sinabek nu payniyaru'. U Pangcah han tu i, makaen ku lusay nu kakurut, makaen naca ku luengelay a teluc nu caay atu papah. U langdaw nu papah mikialengel tu ni palumaan a kakurut, kilemel ku nika' urip nu caang sisa awa:ay ku kemanay nu cirekay, saka ulahan nu tamdaw a kemaen. Pi'arawan to lakaw

kakorot malecaday ato tananoman, o mikayatay a masarengosay ko caang, kilemel a mikocakoc. Dengay a mibohat to sakaen, to so'aw, to caledes, to doko, to lemawan ko kakorot. I tini i Taywan, Makala to patekenan ko mihecaan no nika'orip no kakorot no lotok. Belong samin i matini a paloma, a mibowah. o tapang no sinabek no payniyaro'. U Pangcah han to i, makaen ko losay no kakorot, makaen naca ko loengelay a teloc no caay ato papah. U langdaw no papah mikialengel to ni palomaan a kakorot, kilemel ko nika' orip no caang sisa awa:ay ko kemanay no cirekay, saka olahan no tamdaw a kemaen. Pi'arawan to lakaw
